name: Snake Man
description:
Game inspired by Pac-Man and Snake. It's a mix of mechanics between both games that transforms it in a competition for 2 players. 

  • Games can be played locally or online. 
  • 3 different maps
  • Play against a friend, a bot or play alone

Controls:

  • WASD and arrow keys to move
  • Esc to pause
  • Enter/Space to confirm
